item.title: Light green pen on Green Street cabinet by bus stop, 11th November
item.description:
You have received a request via Love Clean Streets to remedy an issue within your Service Area: Graffiti - Non offensive report at 4 Hamlet Road, Anerley, London, SE19 2AW, raised by on 10/11/2025 13:55 Graffiti - Non offensive Lat/Long - 51.4158773, -0.0728384 what3words - mutual.grow.lasted Nearest address - 4 Hamlet Road, Anerley, London, SE19 2AW

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Hamlet Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tree is located at the back of Mary Cray Station so not sure if it is public or private, 11th November
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: To whom this may concern, I would like to report two concerns on Roundlyn Gardens which require attention. 1. Overgrown Tree - There is a tree which stems from Mary Cray Station which has overgrown past the fence and is now hanging over into the close and near our driveway. If left unattended could continue to grow and cause potential damange 2. Unstable Fence - The fence is also located in the same area and due to unpleasant weather conditions has become weak overtime and is now leaning forward. It is deemed unstable and could also cause potential damage to both cars and residents if it collapes • What action (if any) would you like us to take? For both concerns to please be inspected and appropriate repair/maintenance to be implemented. I have images of both concerns, nevertheless the form only permits one image

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Furzehill Square, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
